attributes.action: End body-mod discrimination in work and learning environments now
attributes.additional_details:
A teacher sent home for tattoos on show:

attributes.background:
Being turned away from college courses, jobs, being told to change how you are comfortable looking all because of body-mods (tattoos, brightly coloured hair, piercings etc) is unacceptable and needs to end. Why are we told the way we look is unprofessional? 
Modified people are not monsters.

rejection.details: If you would like it to be made illegal for employers or education institutions to discriminate against people because of body-mods, you could start a petition asking for a change in the law.
